Package kerdrel.tugdual.characters

Class Wizard

java.lang.Object
kerdrel.tugdual.characters.Character
kerdrel.tugdual.characters.Wizard
public class Wizard extends Character
Class Wizard This class represents a wizard character in the game. It extends the Character class and adds fields and methods specific to wizards.

  • Field Summary

      health - the health of the wizard
      shield - the shield of the wizard
      attackPower - the attack power of the wizard
      precision - the precision of the wizard
      pet - the wizard's pet
      wand - the wizard's wand
      house - the wizard's house

      public float attack (Spell spellUsed)
